resources.string: It is time to take your malaria medicine!
See below for Q & A on the crucial importance of taking malaria medications regularly from our returned Peace Corps Volunteers:
Malaria is a mosquito-carried deadly disease.
If you are a RPCV who has experienced combatting malaria, please help us spread accurate information to current Peace Corps Volunteers by submitting your word at innovation (at) peacecorps.gov.
